title: When Do Hinge Likes Reset (and How to Get More)

steps.title: Hinge Likes reset each day at 4:00 AM.
steps.content: Hinge Likes reset each day at 4:00 AM. If you use up all eight of your Hinge Likes in a day, you will have to wait until 4:00 AM local time to get more likes to send. [2] X Research source Once you match with another user, you can exchange an unlimited number of messages. You can still receive Likes from other users when your own Likes are unavailable. Likes are separate from Roses. Hinge provides one free Rose each week, and additional Roses can be purchased in bundles of varying sizes. Using a Rose does not count against your eight free Likes. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Hinge+ and HingeX subscribers get an unlimited amount of Likes.
steps.content: Hinge+ and HingeX subscribers get an unlimited amount of Likes. If you subscribe to either of Hinge's premium subscription plans, you no longer have to worry about your Likes resetting. [4] X Research source In fact, your Likes never run out at all!
